model_outputs.question:
The following translations from German to English contain a particular error. That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Negation or Antonyms: Introduce or remove a negation or change comparatives to their antonyms. Facts: Trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Karl Borromäus Joseph Fürst von Liechtenstein war ein kaiserlicher Feldmarschall.
Translation: Charles Borromeo Joseph Prince of Liechtenstein was an judicial field marshal.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
Option (D): Named Entities
The name "Karl Borromäus Joseph Fürst von Liechtenstein" in the German source text is translated to "Charles Borromeo Joseph Prince of Liechtenstein" in the English translation. However, the given name "Karl" in the source text is not present in the translation, indicating that it has been changed to a different name (i.e., "Charles").

model_outputs.question:
The following translations from German to English contain a particular error. That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Negation or Antonyms: Introduce or remove a negation or change comparatives to their antonyms. Facts: Trivial factual errors not pertaining to the above classes are introduced in the translations. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Georg Otto Bussenius war ein deutscher Lehrer.
Translation: Otto was a German teacher.
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer:
I'll go through the elimination process to try and come to the right answer.

A. Modifiers or Adjectives: This error would result in the translation changing the words modifying the noun "Lehrer" (teacher). However, no such change has happened in the translated sentence.

B. Numerical Values: This error would result in the translation changing a numerical value such as an age, date, time, or measurement. However, there are no numerical values in the original sentence.

C. Negation or Antonyms: This error would result in the translation changing a negation (not) or an antonym (opposite) related to the noun "Lehrer". However, there is no negation or antonym in the original sentence.

D. Named Entities: This error would result in the translation changing a specific entity such as a person, place, or organization. Given that the translated sentence is simply "Otto was a teacher." and not "Otto was a German teacher.", it can be concluded that the error is related to named entities.

E. Dropped Content: This error would result in the translation removing a significant clause from the original sentence. However, there is no significant clause missing from the translated sentence.

F. Facts: This error would result in the translation introducing a factual error that is not related to the other categories. Given that the translated sentence is simply "Otto was a teacher.", it can be concluded that the error is not related to factual errors.

Therefore, the answer is (D) Named Entities.
